text: Egha igharazitav, a mirakelbagh amir gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a Godɨn otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a duaba tuisɨghamin gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, Godɨn Duamɨn otivir mɨzer guar avɨribav kɨmamin gavgavim a ganɨdi. Egha igharazitav, a mɨzer kabagh ighavkɨnamin gavgavim a ganɨdi.
